name: FourBitLedDigitalTube
description: A 4-bit Led Digital Tube Module simple to use library, Developed for the cheap and popular 7-segment 4 digits led displays based on two TM74HC595 (or similar) shift registers, the main focus was set in ease of use, flexibility and basic prevention of 'misrepresentation' errors, so that if a value can't be faithfully represented by the display, the display will remain clear and the method will return a false value.
